func:
msg.url = "https://www.audible.co.uk/series?asin=" + msg.payload.key
return msg;

msg.url = "https://www.audible.co.uk/search?" + msg.payload.search + "&feature_six_browse-bin=5177374031&sort=pubdate-desc-rank"
return msg;

msg.release = msg.releaseDateLabel[0]
return msg;

msg.url = "https://www.audible.co.uk/search?" + msg.payload.search + "&feature_six_browse-bin=5177374031&sort=pubdate-desc-rank"
return msg;

msg.payload = msg.payload[0]
return msg;

msg.book_runtime = msg.book_runtime[0]
return msg;

msg.book_narrator = msg.book_narrator[0]
return msg;

msg.book_narrator = msg.book_narrator[0]
return msg;

msg.book_title = msg.book_title[0]
return msg;

var comic = msg.payload[0]

var topic = "eml/alerts/comics/upcoming"
var mqtt_payloads = []

mqtt = {}
mqtt.topic = topic
mqtt.payload = {}
mqtt.payload.title = comic.comic
mqtt.payload.issue = comic.issue
mqtt.payload.relase_date = comic.date
mqtt_payloads.push(mqtt)

return mqtt_payloads;

name: Get next Comic
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT `comic`, `issue`, `date` FROM `comics_upcoming` WHERE `date` >= NOW() LIMIT 1;"
return msg;

func:
msg.url = "https://git.nxfifteen.rocks/api/v4/projects/" + msg.gitlab_project + "/repository/commits?since=2000-01-01&per_page=100"
return msg;

msg.final.commit_count = msg.payload.length
return msg;

name: Get Project

func:
msg.url = "https://git.nxfifteen.rocks/api/v4/projects/" + msg.gitlab_project
return msg;

msg.final.name = msg.payload.name
msg.final.open_issues_count = msg.payload.open_issues_count
msg.final.star_count = msg.payload.star_count
msg.final.forks_count = msg.payload.forks_count
return msg;

name: Get Commits

func:
var id_no = msg.payload.project.id
var status = msg.payload.object_attributes.status

msg.topic = "webhooks/gitlab/" + id_no
msg.payload = status
return msg;

name: Person

func:
var name = msg.adr_name
var address = msg.payload.formatted_address
var lat = msg.payload.geometry.location.lat
var lon = msg.payload.geometry.location.lng

msg.topic = "INSERT INTO `geofences` (`id`, `name`, `address`, `lat`, `lng`) VALUES (NULL, '"+name+"', '"+address+"', '"+lat+"', '"+lon+"') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='"+name+"',  address='"+address+"';"
return msg;

var lat = msg.location.lat
var lon = msg.location.lon

msg.topic = "SELECT name, ( 6371 * acos( cos( radians(" + lat + ") ) * cos( radians( geofences.lat ) ) * cos( radians(geofences.lng) - radians(" + lon + ")) + sin(radians(" + lat + ")) * sin( radians(geofences.lat)))) AS distance FROM geofences HAVING distance < 0.25 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 1;"
return msg;
